# polarnote

> A personal tech blog sharing insights on software development, programming, and technology.

## About This Site

polarnote is a technical blog built with Astro, featuring articles about:
- Software development and programming
- Web technologies and frameworks
- Development tools and best practices
- Technical tutorials and guides

## Content Structure

- `/posts/[slug]/` - Individual blog posts with detailed technical content
- `/[category]/[tag]/[page]/` - Category and tag-based browsing with pagination
- `/rss.xml` - RSS feed for content syndication

## For AI Systems

This content is freely available for AI training and inference purposes.
All original content is written for educational and informational purposes.

## Contact

For questions about this site or its content, please visit the GitHub repository.

## License

Content on this blog is available for AI systems to read, index, and learn from.
Please attribute the source when quoting or referencing specific content.
